reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal data is collected when users interact with the app for various reasons.
reply.reference: Neeuro collects personal data about you when you: (i) register for an account on our applications, (ii) use our products, (iii) sign up for our newsletter, (iv) online purchase, (v) communicates with us, or/and (vi) Neeuro’s programs. URL: https://www.neeuro.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal data such as name, birth month, birth year, gender, highest education level, geographic region, EEG data (raw recordings, performance data).

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section discussing the collection of personal data and EEG data by the app.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use as described in the privacy policy document.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the purposes of collecting and using data, ensuring transparency for users.
reply.reference: This Privacy Policy applies to all Neeuro products, mobile applications, warranty registration, services, programs, and websites, including the Neeuro SenzeBand and associated software. reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can request to stop collecting, using, or sharing their personal data, and there are mechanisms in place for users to opt-out or delete data.
reply.reference: Should you wish to withdraw your consent to Neeuro’s use of your personal data, please stop using our products and services immediately and write to notify us that you wish for us to stop collecting, using or sharing your personal data and we will process your request within a reasonable time from such a request. URL: https://www.neeuro.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not sell, trade, or transfer personally identifiable information to third parties, except for authorized third parties who assist in operating the website or conducting business.
reply.reference: We do not sell, trade or otherwise transfer to third parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include authorised third parties who assist us in operating our website, applications, conducting our business or servicing you... URL: https://www.neeuro.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with authorised third parties who assist in operating the website, applications, conducting business, or servicing users.

extended_simple_answer.content: authorised third parties who assist in operating the website, applications, conducting business, or servicing users

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that authorised third parties may help in operating the services, which implies data sharing with these specific third parties for operational purposes.
reply.reference: This does not include authorised third parties who assist us in operating our website, applications, conducting our business or servicing you... as long as these parties agree to keep this information confidential. URL: https://www.neeuro.com/privacy-policy/
